snippet: Brigadier General Sar Theth is the police chief of Battambang, a languid riverside town in western Cambodia. You could also call him the seven million dollar man....

headline.print_headline: Record Bust in Cambodia Signals Thai Dollar Counterfeiting Boom
headline.main: Record Bust in Cambodia Signals Thai Dollar Counterfeiting Boom

lead_paragraph: Brigadier General Sar Theth is the police chief of Battambang, a languid riverside town in western Cambodia. You could also call him the seven million dollar man.
